trans-unit.source: Provides an editor for selecting message body files in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um editor para selecionar os arquivos de corpo de mensagem em um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor> class provides a user interface for selecting a file for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor> classe fornece uma interface do usuário para selecionar um arquivo para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A> specifies the file that contains the email message body.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A> Especifica o arquivo que contém o corpo da mensagem de email.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> objects define the content and format of the email notification messages that are sent by controls.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> objetos definem o conteúdo e o formato das mensagens de notificação de email que são enviadas por controles.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> controls use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> controla o uso de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor> is invoked, for example, by selecting the ellipsis (**…**) button on the **BodyFileName** property, under **MailDefinition**, in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor> é invocado, por exemplo, selecionando as reticências (**... **) no botão de **BodyFileName** propriedade, em **MailDefinition**, no **propriedades** grade do visual designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor.Caption%2A> property specifies the caption that is to appear on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor> form.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor.Caption%2A> propriedade especifica a legenda apareça no <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor> formulário.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor.Filter%2A> property returns the list of file types that is to be accepted by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor.Filter%2A> propriedade retorna a lista de tipos de arquivo que deve ser aceito pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor" />.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor> class when you invoke the editor in a control that encapsulates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor> classe quando você invocar o editor em um controle que encapsula uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> objeto.

trans-unit.source: For example, you select the ellipsis (**…**) button on the **BodyFileName** property, under **MailDefinition**, in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer, when designing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, selecione as reticências (**... **) no botão de **BodyFileName** propriedade, em **MailDefinition**, no **propriedades** grade do visual designer, durante a criação de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the caption to appear on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor" /> form.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a legenda que deverá aparecer no formulário <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that is the caption to appear on the editor form.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que é a legenda a ser exibida no formulário de editor.

trans-unit.source: The default value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor.Caption%2A> property is a message instructing the user to select an email file.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor.Caption%2A> propriedade é uma mensagem solicitando que o usuário para selecionar um arquivo de email.

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor.Caption" /> property to return a value that is different than the default.
trans-unit.target: Substituir o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor.Caption" /> propriedade para retornar um valor que é diferente do padrão.

trans-unit.source: The default value is localized.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é localizado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of file types for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor" /> object to accept.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a lista de tipos de arquivo a serem aceitos pelo o objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor" />.

trans-unit.source: A string specifying a user-friendly name for each accepted file type and file specifications for each type.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres especificando um nome amigável para cada aceita o tipo de arquivo e especificações de arquivo para cada tipo.

trans-unit.source: The format for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor.Filter%2A> property for each type is as follows:
trans-unit.target: O formato para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor.Filter%2A> para cada tipo é o seguinte:

trans-unit.source: A user-friendly description.
trans-unit.target: Uma descrição amigável.

trans-unit.source: A vertical bar (`|`).
trans-unit.target: Uma barra vertical (`|`).

trans-unit.source: File specifications, separated by a semicolon (`;`).
trans-unit.target: Arquivo, separados por ponto e vírgula (`;`).

trans-unit.source: Another vertical bar (`|`).
trans-unit.target: Outra barra vertical (`|`).

trans-unit.source: For example, a filter that specifies text files, HTML files, and all files would look like the following example, in EN-US locale:
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um filtro que especifica todos os arquivos, arquivos de texto e arquivos HTML seria semelhante ao seguinte exemplo, na localidade EN-US:

trans-unit.source: A localized version of this string is the default value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor.Filter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Uma versão localizada da cadeia de caracteres é o valor padrão para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor.Filter%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor.Filter" /> property to return a value that is different from the default.
trans-unit.target: Substituir o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor.Filter" /> propriedade para retornar um valor que é diferente do padrão.
